name: Brickworks
description:
Brickworks is our Virtual Reality experiment in manipulating blocks with grips, physics, and lasers. Cut, carve, and toss blocks into new shapes that react dynamically to each other. Compatible with HTC Vive, motion controllers, and roomscale configuration. Available for free.

For more information, visit our website:

https://minoshdigital.com/
